articles.description: Sophomore Nolan Narain came off the bench to score a career-high 18 points and fellow reserve Jordan Schakel had 14 points for San Diego State, which raced to a 23-point lead before holding off Wyoming 87-77 Wednesday night.
articles.headline: Reserves Narain, Schakel spark SDSU to 87-77 win vs Wyoming

articles.description: Kendall Stephens tied his career-high with 21 points and Caleb Martin also had 21 to lead No. 24 Nevada past Boise State 77-72 on Wednesday night.
articles.headline: No. 24 Nevada beats Boise State 77-72

images.caption: Kendall Stephens pulls up from deep and knocks down a 3 to tie the game at 27-27.
images.name: Nevada's Stephens shows range to tie game

articles.description: There was no doubt who was the better team on Wednesday as No. 10 Auburn easily dispatched an unranked Kentucky team.
articles.headline: Auburn keeps doing what it's done all season, even against Kentucky

images.caption: While Anfernee McLemore and the Tigers made just 36.7 percent of their field goals, it was enough to beat a slumping Wildcats squad.
images.name: Anfernee McLemore celebration [576x324]

articles.description: Jovan Mooring scored 24 points, Brandon McCoy added 10 points and 13 rebounds and UNLV beat Air Force 81-73 on Wednesday night.
articles.headline: UNLV pulls away late, beats Air Force 81-73

articles.description: Kyvon Davenport scored with 13 seconds remaining and Jamal Johnson added a free throw with four seconds on the clock and a balanced Memphis squad held off SMU 70-67 Wednesday night.
articles.headline: Memphis outlasts McMurray, SMU in 70-67 squeaker

articles.description: Dikymbe Martin scored 18 points, six of them in the final three minutes, as UC Riverside held off a late rally to beat Cal State Northridge, 69-62 in a Big West contest Wednesday night.
articles.headline: UC Riverside gets 2nd Big West win, top CSU Northridge 69-62

videos.description: West Virginia's Jevon Carter swings the ball to Lamont West behind the arc for the 3-pointer.
videos.headline: Carter finds West for 3

videos.description: West Virginia's Jevon Carter feeds Sagaba Konate down low for the loud dunk in the first half.
videos.headline: Konate throws down emphatic dunk

videos.description: West Virginia's Daxter Miles Jr. drives down the lane and buries the contested layup in the first half.
videos.headline: Miles sinks tough layup for and-1 opportunity

videos.description: West Virginia's Chase Harler kicks the ball out to Jevon Carter for the deep 3-pointer in the first half.
videos.headline: Carter shows off the range with long 3-pointer

videos.description: Pittsburgh's Marcus Carr finds Ryan Luther cutting down the lane for the layup and a chance at a 3-point play.
videos.headline: Carr feeds Luther for and-1 opportunity

videos.description: Pittsburgh's Shamiel Stevenson finds Marcus Carr open behind the arc for the 3-pointer.
videos.headline: Carr converts from downtown

videos.description: Pittsburgh's Parker Stewart swings the ball to Shamiel Stevenson for the layup and opportunity for a 3-point play.
videos.headline: Stevenson nails big layup for and-1 chance

videos.description: Pittsburgh's Khameron Davis finds Marcus Carr behind the arc for a 4-point play opportunity.
videos.headline: Carr sinks contested 3-pointer to earn and-1 chance

videos.description: After grabbing the offensive rebound, West Virginia's Sagaba Konate goes up strong and drains the post jump shot to earn a trip to the line.
videos.headline: Konate knocks down big bucket for 3-point opportunity

videos.description: After grabbing the steal, West Virginia's Daxter Miles Jr. goes right by the defense for the easy layup.
videos.headline: Miles breezes by Panthers for easy layup
